Control.name: $(parent)_Header
Control.Controls:
<Label name="$(parent)_Title" color="EFEBBE" font="ZoFontWinH3" text="" verticalAlignment="CENTER" wrapMode="ELLIPSIS" >
AnLorXen_Builder_CurrentItem_EditAlias_OnFocusLost(self)
AnLorXen_Builder_CurrentItem_Rename_OnClicked(self)
ZO_Tooltips_ShowTextTooltip(self, TOP, "Rename Item")
ZO_Tooltips_HideTextTooltip()

Control.name: $(parent)_Header
Control.Controls: <Label name="$(parent)_Title" text="" font="ZoFontWinH4" color="EFEBBE" wrapMode="ELLIPSIS" verticalAlignment="CENTER" >
